rules_text:
Observation Field enters with three charge counters on it.
{2}, {T}, Remove a charge counter from Observation Field: Draw a card and gain 2 life.
{T}, Sacrifice Observation Field: Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavor_text: [i]It reveals a little bit of everything, all of the time.[/i]
notes: Welcome to the Internet — Bo Burnham
